title: koindeks
author: koindeks
content: Quontral API is live!Welcome to Quontral API! You can send requests to 6 of the world's largest liquidity pools using the Quontral API. In this way, you can find the best price of the token you want to swap.Quontral is developing an API technology that provides end-to-end liquidity endpoints. Developers who want to develop DEX or dApp can use Quontral API for token swap transactions. Quontral sends requests to 6 different liquidity pools at the same time. In this way, it finds the most suitable price match and shows it to the user.Presale: https://www.pinksale.finance/launchpad/0xBD6D2DCE3FAc72BE84E5f45DB0a08E0850cc6d52?chain=BSCName: QuontralSymbol: QUONChain: BSCCategory: DeFI, WEB3Maximum supply: 100,000Githubhttps://github.com/quontralQuonstal SDK (NPM)https://www.npmjs.com/package/quontralWebsitehttps://quontral.comhttps://app.quontral.comhttps://docs.quontral.comCommunityWebsite: https://quontral.comTelegram Channel: http://t.me/quontralTelegram Group: http://t.me/quontral_globalDiscord: https://discord.com/invite/GJ9sYN5ySkReddit: https://reddit.com/r/quontralAudit: https://github.com/interfinetwork/project-delivery-data/blob/main/Quontral/Quontral_AuditReport_InterFi.pdfKYC: https://pinksale.notion.site/Quontral-KYC-Verification-c1bde1b4c04a4349a9c1a710e68098e5Contact Usinfo@quontral.com
